data.name: home.press.h3
data.value: In the press:

data.name: home.press.quote_1
data.value: “Challenging Visa through a global currency for the future”

data.name: home.press.read
data.value: Read article

data.name: home.points.more
data.value: More

data.name: home.points.point_1
data.value: Everyone wants to be part of Lehmon Brothers, but it's not that easy; first, you need an invitation.

data.name: home.points.point_1_more_p_1
data.value: Each new brother in Lehmon Brothers has an amount of $LEMON Tokens that can be reserved exclusively for you, without needing to spend anything to make the reservation. So, the sooner you join, the more $LEMON you can reserve.

data.name: home.points.point_2
data.value: The invitation is made through a brother's link; you access the link and connect your wallet.

data.name: home.points.point_2_more_p_1
data.value: The brother who owns the invitation link just needs to approve your entry into Lehmon Brothers. Once you join, 10% of the total amount of your spot is already reserved for you, and with that, we are building a really strong community.

data.name: home.points.point_3
data.value: Once you become a brother, you will also have an invitation link.

data.name: home.points.point_3_more_p_1
data.value: Upon joining, you get an invitation link to invite new brothers. You can approve up to 5 new brothers, so choose well whom you will invite. By approving new brothers, you secure more $LEMON in reserve for yourself.

data.name: home.points.point_4
data.value: The invitation period will last for a very, very limited time.

data.name: home.points.point_4_more_p_1
data.value: It will not be possible to reserve $LEMON after this period, so you need to join soon. After the invitation period, a new phase will begin: the fair distribution of $LEMON.

data.name: home.points.point_5
data.value: The fair distribution of $LEMON will ensure that the largest number of tokens is already distributed at its launch.

data.name: home.points.point_5_more_p_1
data.value: The distribution phase will be the moment when a fundraising will take place, with a minimum value of 20 ADA and no maximum limit. This phase is open, and anyone can participate. The percentage relative to the total ADA sent to the fundraising wallet will be the percentage of $LEMON corresponding to that phase that you will receive. Brothers who have already reserved $LEMON and participated in the fundraising will receive the amount relative to their participation in the contribution pool, plus the tokens reserved in the reservation phase.

data.name: home.points.point_6
data.value: 100% of the total ADA collected (minus fees) will go to the liquidity pool.

data.name: home.points.point_6_more_p_1
data.value: After the fundraising phase, we will distribute in the liquidity pools of the top 3 Cardano DEXs, proportionally to the DEX's participation in the network.

data.name: home.points.point_7
data.value: Now the fun begins... We will build many things to make our community big, strong, and become the largest non-animal memecoin in the world.

data.name: home.points.point_7_more_p_1
data.value: Lehmon Brothers, with its $LEMON, is more than a memecoin project; it's a cultural turnaround. At the moment, network memes look like a zoo. New things will come to greatly foster the community and make $LEMON yield good lemonades.

data.name: home.point_more
data.value: Learn more

data.value: Join right now

data.value: Free

data.name: home.win.win_1_txt

data.value: Why not?

data.name: home.win.win_3_txt
data.value: Think of it as getting bitcoin many years ago.

data.value: Estamos atualizando o serviço e voltaremos em breve. Agradecemos sua paciência.

data.name: about.article
data.value: About

data.name: about.article.article_p
data.value: Lehmon Brothers is an initiative created to be something more than a simple community; it was created to be a space where the bravest, most acidic lemons ready to challenge the status quo meet. Lehmon Brothers is where lemons come together to fight in an epic meme battle.

data.name: tokenization.article_p
data.value: An average lemon can produce approximately 30–45 ml of juice.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_1
data.value: 50% of the token supply will be distributed among all pre-sale participants. Of these tokens, 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be made available in the reservation phase. The other 50% (25% of the total - 11,250,000,000) will be available in the pre-sale open to the public, without prior qualifications. The distribution will be based on a snapshot of the funds sent and carried out through an airdrop. Pre-sale participants who have reserved tokens will receive a proportional share in the distribution, in addition to the amount of tokens effectively reserved.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_2
data.value: 40% of the token supply will be allocated to initial liquidity, which will be distributed proportionally to the participation on the SundaeSwap and Minswap networks. The Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens will be stored in a multisig wallet for greater security.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_3
data.value: 6% of the token supply will be used for marketing promotions, community airdrops, events, and incentives to promote $LEMON.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_4
data.value: 3% of the token supply is reserved for exchange listings and expansion opportunities.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_p_5
data.value: 1% will be distributed in the first weeks during the meme battles we will organize among our brothers.

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_2
data.value: 40% - Initial Liquidity:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_3
data.value: 6% - Marketing:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_4
data.value: 3% - Reserve:

data.name: tokenization.li_span_title_5
data.value: 1% - Meme Battle:

data.value: You are not connected

data.name: verify.SemConvite.h1
data.value: You have not yet received an invitation

data.name: verify.SemConvite.p
data.value: Search in one of our official channels for people who can give you an invitation. Hurry because with each passing minute, less $LEMON can be reserved by you.
